thread.section_title: Hotel Saint-Marc - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely all the way around
thread.title_full: Lovely all the way around - Review of Hotel Saint-Marc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kirk W
title: Lovely all the way around
text:
I will stay here every trip back to Paris. Perfection. From the staff, to the room, to the spa...Perfection.
A single word of warning, the spa has CCTV. W did not notice this during our visit. Our private spa visit. Our private spa visit on our romantic weekend in Paris. Film at 11.
